朔.definition: beginning; first day of lunar month; north

朔城.definition: Shuocheng district of Shuozhou city 朔州市[Shuo4 zhou1 shi4], Shanxi

朔城區.definition: Shuocheng district of Shuozhou city 朔州市[Shuo4 zhou1 shi4], Shanxi

朔州市.definition: Shuozhou, prefecture-level city in Shanxi Province 山西省[Shan1xi1 Sheng3]

朔日.definition: first day of the lunar month

朔月.definition: new moon; first day of the lunar month

朔望.definition: the new moon; the first day of the lunar month

朔望潮.definition: spring tide (biggest tide, at new moon or full moon)

朔風凜冽.definition: The north wind is icy cold.
